column2: Apply copper-based fungicides and neem oil as a preventive measure
Use a mixture of compost tea and neem oil to control the spread
Spray with a solution of baking soda and water to reduce spore development
Apply sulfur-based fungicides or neem oil for organic control
Use a spray of diluted hydrogen peroxide or neem oil weekly
Introduce predatory mites or use insecticidal soap and neem oil
Use compost tea or neem oil to treat infected plants
Control whiteflies using neem oil and reflective mulches to reduce transmission
